Pets Corner | LinkedIn Skip to main content LinkedIn Articles People Learning Jobs Games Join now Sign in Pets Corner Retail Crawley, England 6,148 followers Family Run Pet Shop Since 1968. Follow Discover all 445 employees Report this company About us Pets Corner UK Ltd is a United Kingdom-based ethical pet care retail store chain. Its main area of business is selling specialist natural pet foods, accessories and treatments predominantly for dogs and cats, but also for small animals, reptiles, birds, wildlife, and tropical and cold water fish.

The company's headquarters is in Crawley, West Sussex, United Kingdom. It has 150 stores across the UK. Established in 1968, the organisation has continued to grow, and in April 2016 it acquired competitor retailer PamPurredPets adding an additional 51 stores to its existing portfolio, making it the second largest pet retailer in the UK by store numbers and EBITDA. Website http://www.petscorner.co.uk External link for Pets Corner Industry Retail Company size 1,001-5,000 employees Headquarters Crawley, England Type Privately Held Founded 1968 Locations Primary Spindle Way Crawley, England RH10 1TG, GB Get directions Employees at Pets Corner Hannah Lawless Store Support & Data Admin lorraine sargeant Owner, Pets corner Martin Loeber Guitar, Mandolin, Dobro. Corner Ventures | Venture Capital Firm top of page Home About Companies Prior Investments Team Blog News Login Menu Close Home About Companies Prior Investments Team Blog News Login Partnering with bold founders & investors Trusted Partner True Value Add More Than Just Capital Go Global Dare to Dream Building Iconic Companies Leading the growth rounds of the next great global companies Corner Ventures was founded to invest in the next generation of iconic technology companies. Since our founding in 2018, we‚Äôve partnered with top-tier early-stage venture firms and exceptional entrepreneurs with an aim to create exceptional outcomes. Today, we continue to build upon our legacy as a trusted partner and resource to founders, seed and Series A investors, and world-class innovators by providing unique insights, strategic growth capital, and access to global investors and commercial networks. From our offices in Palo Alto, New York, Tel Aviv and Tokyo, we work closely with our partners, portfolio companies and their respective founders to help navigate the transition from promising startup to category-defining leader. Our international platform of investors and strategic partners provide companies the foundation from which to launch rapid international expansion. Throughout our history, we‚Äôve been fortunate to work with many of the world‚Äôs most disruptive companies, visionaries, and technology leaders. We have invested in over 200 companies at and prior to Corner Ventures, with over 145 exits, including 30 IPOs, and we‚Äôre just getting started. Current Investments Team Marvin Tien Co-founder General Partner Jane Mathieu Partner Jonathan Pulitzer General Partner ‚Äì Israel John Cadeddu Co-founder General Partner Tom Goodrich Co-founder General Partner Atsuo Sakurai Partner ‚Äì Japan Kevin Tanaka Principal Andrew Cohen Principal Deberah Stark Administrative Controller Shab Danesh Executive Assistant Malia Pita Office Manager Prior¬†Investments All Prior Investments OUR OFFICES CONTACT US UNITED STATES 251 Lytton Avenue, Suite 200 Palo Alto, CA 94301 ‚Äã 809 Broadway New York, NY 10003 INTERNATIONAL 121 Menachem Begin, 61st Floor Tel Aviv, 6701203 Israel ‚Äã W22F Shibuya Mark City, 1-12-1 Dogenzaka, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo 150-0043 Have any questions? About us - Speakers Corner Dawah YouTube Channel | Dawahwise.com Skip to content Home About us Our mission Our vision Contact us New Muslims Donate Donate Main Menu About DawahWise In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Welcome to DawahWise, the official platform of Mansur and Hashim. Our mission is to share the profound message of Islam through enlightening debates, engaging live streams, and educational videos. We strive to empower individuals globally with a deeper understanding of Islam, addressing misconceptions and fostering respectful dialogues. Our History Introduction At DawahWise, we are dedicated to empowering individuals and communities through education, outreach, and support. Our journey began in Aug 2020 with a group of passionate individuals committed to fostering mutual understanding and respect across diverse backgrounds. Today, we continue to grow and expand our reach, guided by our core values and unwavering dedication to our mission. DawahWise was founded by Hashim and Mansur, whose vision was to create a platform where knowledge could be shared freely and compassionately. Over the years, we have launched numerous programs and initiatives that have positively impacted thousands of lives. Our history is a testament to the power of community and the importance of continuous learning and support. Meet Our Founders Mansur Mansur is a renowned speaker and debater at Speakers Corner with a deep passion for Dawah and Apologetics. With a background in Islamic studies and years of experience, Mansur is dedicated to educating people about Islam and addressing misconceptions. His engaging speaking style and ability to connect with diverse audiences have made him a respected figure in the Muslim community. Areas of Expertise Islamic Theology Comparative Religion Debates and Public Speaking Vision Mansur aims to foster a better understanding of Islam through respectful dialogue and informed discussions. His commitment to spreading knowledge and promoting peace is at the core of his work at DawahWise. Hashim Hashim is a key figure at Speakers Corner, known for his articulate and thoughtful approach to Dawah. With a strong foundation in Islamic teachings and a keen interest in contemporary issues, Hashim addresses challenging questions with clarity and compassion. His ability to engage with people from all walks of life has earned him a loyal following. Areas of Expertise Islamic Apologetics Interfaith Dialogue Social Issues and Islam Vision Hashim is dedicated to empowering individuals with the knowledge of Islam, fostering mutual respect, and bridging gaps between different communities. Through DawahWise, he strives to create a platform for open, honest, and constructive conversations about Islam. Home About us Our mission Our vision Contact us New Muslims Donate Donate Donate Kindly donate generously and contribute to our ongoing expenses Connect with DawahWise. We welcome your questions, comments, and feedback!
